member.summary:
Collects all files located under specified path and stores them in object. Only results matching specified regular expression are gathered. Scope of collection depends on current state.
Reference of regular expression language: http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/az24scfc%28v=vs.110%29.aspx
